markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Esteemed Visitor](/Feats.aspx?ID=1215) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 72</row>

</column>

---

Your polite manners and natural ability to comfort others make it easy for you to break down cultural barriers and earn strangers’ trust. While you are in a settlement, when you roll a critical failure on a [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) check to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49) or [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50), you get a failure instead.
name: Esteemed Visitor
